entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:48 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 10:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: SE 17 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Fog patches before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
